      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-11" id="section-11"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Dutch bank account numbers (not 'giro' numbers) have 9 digits
and pass the '11 check'.
We accept the notation with spaces, as that is common.
acceptable: 123456789 or 12 34 56 789</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"bankaccountNL"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^[0-9]{9}|([0-9]{2} ){3}[0-9]{3}$/</span>.test( value ) ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-12" id="section-12"></a>
</div>
<p>Now '11 check'</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> account = value.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/ /g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ), <span class="hljs-comment">// Remove spaces</span>
		sum = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		len = account.length,
		pos, factor, digit;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( pos = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; pos &lt; len; pos++ ) {
		factor = len - pos;
		digit = account.substring( pos, pos + <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );
		sum = sum + factor * digit;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> sum % <span class="hljs-number">11</span> === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid bank account number"</span> );

$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"bankorgiroaccountNL"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) ||
			( $.validator.methods.bankaccountNL.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, value, element ) ) ||
			( $.validator.methods.giroaccountNL.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, value, element ) );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid bank or giro account number"</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-13" id="section-13"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>BIC is the business identifier code (ISO 9362). This BIC check is not a guarantee for authenticity.</p>
<p>BIC pattern: BBBBCCLLbbb (8 or 11 characters long; bbb is optional)</p>
<p>Validation is case-insensitive. Please make sure to normalize input yourself.</p>
<p>BIC definition in detail:</p>
<ul>
<li>First 4 characters - bank code (only letters)</li>
<li>Next 2 characters - ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (only letters)</li>
<li>Next 2 characters - location code (letters and digits)
a. shall not start with '0' or '1'
b. second character must be a letter ('O' is not allowed) or digit ('0' for test (therefore not allowed), '1' denoting passive participant, '2' typically reverse-billing)</li>
<li>Last 3 characters - branch code, optional (shall not start with 'X' except in case of 'XXX' for primary office) (letters and digits)</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"bic"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || <span class="hljs-regexp">/^([A-Z]{6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z1-9])(X{3}|[A-WY-Z0-9][A-Z0-9]{2})?$/</span>.test( value.toUpperCase() );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid BIC code"</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-14" id="section-14"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Código de identificación fiscal ( CIF ) is the tax identification code for Spanish legal entities
Further rules can be found in Spanish on http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/C%C3%B3digo_de_identificaci%C3%B3n_fiscal</p>
<p>Spanish CIF structure:</p>
<p>[ T ][ P ][ P ][ N ][ N ][ N ][ N ][ N ][ C ]</p>
<p>Where:</p>
<p>T: 1 character. Kind of Organization Letter: [ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSUVW]
P: 2 characters. Province.
N: 5 characters. Secuencial Number within the province.
C: 1 character. Control Digit: [0-9A-J].</p>
<p>[ T ]: Kind of Organizations. Possible values:</p>
<p>A. Corporations
B. LLCs
C. General partnerships
D. Companies limited partnerships
E. Communities of goods
F. Cooperative Societies
G. Associations
H. Communities of homeowners in horizontal property regime
J. Civil Societies
K. Old format
L. Old format
M. Old format
N. Nonresident entities
P. Local authorities
Q. Autonomous bodies, state or not, and the like, and congregations and religious institutions
R. Congregations and religious institutions (since 2008 ORDER EHA/451/2008)
S. Organs of State Administration and regions
V. Agrarian Transformation
W. Permanent establishments of non-resident in Spain</p>
<p>[ C ]: Control Digit. It can be a number or a letter depending on T value:
[ T ]  --&gt;  [ C ]</p>
<hr>
<p>A         Number
B         Number
E         Number
H         Number
K         Letter
P         Letter
Q         Letter
S         Letter</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"cifES"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
<span class="hljs-meta">
	"use strict"</span>;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> cifRegEx = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^([ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSUVW])(\d{7})([0-9A-J])$/gi</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> letter  = value.substring( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ), <span class="hljs-comment">// [ T ]</span>
		number  = value.substring( <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">8</span> ), <span class="hljs-comment">// [ P ][ P ][ N ][ N ][ N ][ N ][ N ]</span>
		control = value.substring( <span class="hljs-number">8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ), <span class="hljs-comment">// [ C ]</span>
		all_sum = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		even_sum = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		odd_sum = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		i, n,
		control_digit,
		control_letter;

	<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">isOdd</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> n </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> n % <span class="hljs-number">2</span> === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

	control_digit = ( <span class="hljs-number">10</span> - ( all_sum ).toString().substr( <span class="hljs-number">-1</span> ) ).toString();
	control_digit = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( control_digit, <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) &gt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ? <span class="hljs-string">"0"</span> : control_digit;

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-23" id="section-23"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Brazillian CPF number (Cadastrado de Pessoas Físicas) is the equivalent of a Brazilian tax registration number.
CPF numbers have 11 digits in total: 9 numbers followed by 2 check numbers that are being used for validation.</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>

		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( result === cn );
	};

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-31" id="section-31"></a>
</div>
<p>Basing min and max length on
https://developer.ean.com/general_info/Valid_Credit_Card_Types</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( value.length &lt; <span class="hljs-number">13</span> || value.length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">19</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( n = value.length - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; n &gt;= <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; n-- ) {
		cDigit = value.charAt( n );
		nDigit = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( cDigit, <span class="hljs-number">10</span> );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( bEven ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ( nDigit *= <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ) &gt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ) {
				nDigit -= <span class="hljs-number">9</span>;
			}
		}

		nCheck += nDigit;
		bEven = !bEven;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( nCheck % <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please enter a valid credit card number."</span> );

</pre>
        </td>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-32" id="section-32"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>NOTICE: Modified version of Castle.Components.Validator.CreditCardValidator
Redistributed under the the Apache License 2.0 at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Valid Types: mastercard, visa, amex, dinersclub, enroute, discover, jcb, unknown, all (overrides all other settings)</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"creditcardtypes"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element, param </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-regexp">/[^0-9\-]+/</span>.test( value ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

	value = value.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/\D/g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> validTypes = <span class="hljs-number">0x0000</span>;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.mastercard ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0001</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.visa ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0002</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.amex ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0004</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.dinersclub ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0008</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.enroute ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0010</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.discover ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0020</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.jcb ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0040</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.unknown ) {
		validTypes |= <span class="hljs-number">0x0080</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( param.all ) {
		validTypes = <span class="hljs-number">0x0001</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0002</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0004</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0008</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0010</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0020</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0040</span> | <span class="hljs-number">0x0080</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0001</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(5[12345])/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Mastercard</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">16</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0002</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(4)/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Visa</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">16</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0004</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(3[47])/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Amex</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">15</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0008</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(3(0[012345]|[68]))/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Dinersclub</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">14</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0010</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(2(014|149))/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Enroute</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">15</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0020</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(6011)/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Discover</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">16</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0040</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(3)/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Jcb</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">16</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0040</span> &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(2131|1800)/</span>.test( value ) ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Jcb</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.length === <span class="hljs-number">15</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( validTypes &amp; <span class="hljs-number">0x0080</span> ) { <span class="hljs-comment">// Unknown</span>
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please enter a valid credit card number."</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-33" id="section-33"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Validates currencies with any given symbols by @jameslouiz
Symbols can be optional or required. Symbols required by default</p>
<p>Usage examples:
currency: [&quot;£&quot;, false] - Use false for soft currency validation
currency: [&quot;$&quot;, false]
currency: [&quot;RM&quot;, false] - also works with text based symbols such as &quot;RM&quot; - Malaysia Ringgit etc</p>
 <input class="currencyInput" name="currencyInput">
<p>Soft symbol checking
currencyInput: {
currency: [&quot;$&quot;, false]
}</p>
<p>Strict symbol checking (default)
currencyInput: {
currency: &quot;$&quot;
//OR
currency: [&quot;$&quot;, true]
}</p>
<p>Multiple Symbols
currencyInput: {
currency: &quot;$,£,¢&quot;
}</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"currency"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element, param </span>) </span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> isParamString = <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> param === <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span>,
        symbol = isParamString ? param : param[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ],
        soft = isParamString ? <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> : param[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ],
        regex;

    symbol = symbol.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/,/g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );
    symbol = soft ? symbol + <span class="hljs-string">"]"</span> : symbol + <span class="hljs-string">"]?"</span>;
    regex = <span class="hljs-string">"^["</span> + symbol + <span class="hljs-string">"([1-9]{1}[0-9]{0,2}(\\,[0-9]{3})*(\\.[0-9]{0,2})?|[1-9]{1}[0-9]{0,}(\\.[0-9]{0,2})?|0(\\.[0-9]{0,2})?|(\\.[0-9]{1,2})?)$"</span>;
    regex = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( regex );
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || regex.test( value );

}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid currency"</span> );

$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"dateFA"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || <span class="hljs-regexp">/^[1-4]\d{3}\/((0?[1-6]\/((3[0-1])|([1-2][0-9])|(0?[1-9])))|((1[0-2]|(0?[7-9]))\/(30|([1-2][0-9])|(0?[1-9]))))$/</span>.test( value );
}, $.validator.messages.date );

</pre>
        </td>

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-34" id="section-34"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Return true, if the value is a valid date, also making this formal check dd/mm/yyyy.</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
<div class="details">
<div class="dox_tag_title">Type</div>
<div class="dox_tag_detail">
<span class="dox_type">oolea</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"dateITA"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> check = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
		re = <span class="hljs-regexp">/^\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d{4}$/</span>,
		adata, gg, mm, aaaa, xdata;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( re.test( value ) ) {
		adata = value.split( <span class="hljs-string">"/"</span> );
		gg = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( adata[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ], <span class="hljs-number">10</span> );
		mm = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( adata[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ], <span class="hljs-number">10</span> );
		aaaa = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( adata[ <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ], <span class="hljs-number">10</span> );
		xdata = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Date</span>( <span class="hljs-built_in">Date</span>.UTC( aaaa, mm - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, gg, <span class="hljs-number">12</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ) );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ( xdata.getUTCFullYear() === aaaa ) &amp;&amp; ( xdata.getUTCMonth() === mm - <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ) &amp;&amp; ( xdata.getUTCDate() === gg ) ) {
			check = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			check = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
		}
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
		check = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || check;
}, $.validator.messages.date );

$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"dateNL"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(0?[1-9]|[12]\d|3[01])[\.\/\-](0?[1-9]|1[012])[\.\/\-]([12]\d)?(\d\d)$/</span>.test( value );
}, $.validator.messages.date );

</div>
<p>As new countries will start using IBAN in the
future, we only check if the countrycode is known.
This prevents false negatives, while almost all
false positives introduced by this, will be caught
by the checksum validation below anyway.
Strict checking should return FALSE for unknown
countries.</p>

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> bbanpattern !== <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span> ) {

		}
	}

<p>Now check the checksum, first convert to digits</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	ibancheck = iban.substring( <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, iban.length ) + iban.substring( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; ibancheck.length; i++ ) {
		charAt = ibancheck.charAt( i );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( charAt !== <span class="hljs-string">"0"</span> ) {
			leadingZeroes = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !leadingZeroes ) {
			ibancheckdigits += <span class="hljs-string">"0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"</span>.indexOf( charAt );
		}
	}

</pre>

          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( p = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; p &lt; ibancheckdigits.length; p++ ) {

		cOperator = <span class="hljs-string">""</span> + cRest + <span class="hljs-string">""</span> + cChar;
		cRest = cOperator % <span class="hljs-number">97</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> cRest === <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-45" id="section-45"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>For UK phone functions, do the following server side processing:
Compare original input with this RegEx pattern:
^(?(?:(?:00)?[\s-]?(?|+)(44))?[\s-]?(?(?:0)?[\s-]?(?)?|0)([1-9]\d{1,4})?[\s\d-]+)$
Extract $1 and set $prefix to '+44<space>' if $1 is '44', otherwise set $prefix to '0'
Extract $2 and remove hyphens, spaces and parentheses. Phone number is combined $prefix and $2.
A number of very detailed GB telephone number RegEx patterns can also be found at:
http://www.aa-asterisk.org.uk/index.php/Regular_Expressions_for_Validating_and_Formatting_GB_Telephone_Numbers</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"mobileUK"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> phone_number, element </span>) </span>{
	phone_number = phone_number.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/\(|\)|\s+|-/g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || phone_number.length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span> &amp;&amp;
		phone_number.match( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:(?:(?:00\s?|\+)44\s?|0)7(?:[1345789]\d{2}|624)\s?\d{3}\s?\d{3})$/</span> );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid mobile number"</span> );

$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"netmask"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(254|252|248|240|224|192|128)\.0\.0\.0|255\.(254|252|248|240|224|192|128|0)\.0\.0|255\.255\.(254|252|248|240|224|192|128|0)\.0|255\.255\.255\.(254|252|248|240|224|192|128|0)/i</span>.test( value );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please enter a valid netmask."</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-46" id="section-46"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>The NIE (Número de Identificación de Extranjero) is a Spanish tax identification number assigned by the Spanish
authorities to any foreigner.</p>
<p>The NIE is the equivalent of a Spaniards Número de Identificación Fiscal (NIF) which serves as a fiscal
identification number. The CIF number (Certificado de Identificación Fiscal) is equivalent to the NIF, but applies to
companies rather than individuals. The NIE consists of an 'X' or 'Y' followed by 7 or 8 digits then another letter.</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"nieES"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
<span class="hljs-meta">
	"use strict"</span>;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> nieRegEx = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^[MXYZ]{1}[0-9]{7,8}[TRWAGMYFPDXBNJZSQVHLCKET]{1}$/gi</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> validChars = <span class="hljs-string">"TRWAGMYFPDXBNJZSQVHLCKET"</span>,
		letter = value.substr( value.length - <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ).toUpperCase(),
		number;

	value = value.toString().toUpperCase();

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( value.length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">10</span> || value.length &lt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span> || !nieRegEx.test( value ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">

</div>
<p>X means same number
Y means number + 10000000
Z means number + 20000000</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	value = value.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^[X]/</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"0"</span> )

		.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^[Z]/</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"2"</span> );

	number = value.length === <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ? value.substr( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">8</span> ) : value.substr( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span> );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> validChars.charAt( <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( number, <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) % <span class="hljs-number">23</span> ) === letter;

<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>The Número de Identificación Fiscal ( NIF ) is the way tax identification used in Spain for individuals</p>

          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"nifES"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element </span>) </span>{
<span class="hljs-meta">
	"use strict"</span>;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}

	value = value.toUpperCase();

</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Numer identyfikacji podatkowej ( NIP ) is the way tax identification used in Poland for companies</p>
</div>
<div class="body">

          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"nipPL"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{
<span class="hljs-meta">
	"use strict"</span>;

	value = value.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/[^0-9]/g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( value.length !== <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> arrSteps = [ <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span> ];
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> intSum = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span>; i++ ) {
		intSum += arrSteps[ i ] * value[ i ];
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> int2 = intSum % <span class="hljs-number">11</span>;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> intControlNr = ( int2 === <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) ? <span class="hljs-number">0</span> : int2;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( intControlNr === <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( value[ <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ], <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid NIP number."</span> );

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-56" id="section-56"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>For UK phone functions, do the following server side processing:
Compare original input with this RegEx pattern:
^(?(?:(?:00)?[\s-]?(?|+)(44))?[\s-]?(?(?:0)?[\s-]?(?)?|0)([1-9]\d{1,4})?[\s\d-]+)$
Extract $1 and set $prefix to '+44<space>' if $1 is '44', otherwise set $prefix to '0'
Extract $2 and remove hyphens, spaces and parentheses. Phone number is combined $prefix and $2.
A number of very detailed GB telephone number RegEx patterns can also be found at:
http://www.aa-asterisk.org.uk/index.php/Regular_Expressions_for_Validating_and_Formatting_GB_Telephone_Numbers</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">
</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

	phone_number = phone_number.replace( <span class="hljs-regexp">/\(|\)|\s+|-/g</span>, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || phone_number.length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">9</span> &amp;&amp;
		phone_number.match( <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:(?:(?:00\s?|\+)44\s?|0)(?:1\d{8,9}|[23]\d{9}|7(?:[1345789]\d{8}|624\d{6})))$/</span> );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid uk phone number"</span> );

</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Matches US phone number format</p>
<p>where the area code may not start with 1 and the prefix may not start with 1
allows '-' or ' ' as a separator and allows parens around area code
some people may want to put a '1' in front of their number</p>
<p>1(212)-999-2345 or
212 999 2344 or
212-999-0983</p>
<p>but not
111-123-5434
and not
212 123 4567</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-63" id="section-63"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Lets you say &quot;at least X inputs that match selector Y must be filled.&quot;</p>
<p>The end result is that neither of these inputs:</p>
<pre><code>&lt;input class=&quot;productinfo&quot; name=&quot;partnumber&quot;&gt;
&lt;input class=&quot;productinfo&quot; name=&quot;description&quot;&gt;
<p>...will validate unless at least one of them is filled.
</code></pre></p>
<p>partnumber:	{require_from_group: [1,&quot;.productinfo&quot;]},
description: {require_from_group: [1,&quot;.productinfo&quot;]}</p>
<p>options[0]: number of fields that must be filled in the group
options[1]: CSS selector that defines the group of conditionally required fields</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"require_from_group"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element, options </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> $fields = $( options[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ], element.form ),
		$fieldsFirst = $fields.eq( <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ),
		validator = $fieldsFirst.data( <span class="hljs-string">"valid_req_grp"</span> ) ? $fieldsFirst.data( <span class="hljs-string">"valid_req_grp"</span> ) : $.extend( {}, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ),
		isValid = $fields.filter( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> validator.elementValue( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		} ).length &gt;= options[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-65" id="section-65"></a>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !$( element ).data( <span class="hljs-string">"being_validated"</span> ) ) {
		$fields.data( <span class="hljs-string">"being_validated"</span>, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
		$fields.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			validator.element( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		} );
		$fields.data( <span class="hljs-string">"being_validated"</span>, <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> );
	}

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-66" id="section-66"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Lets you say &quot;either at least X inputs that match selector Y must be filled,
OR they must all be skipped (left blank).&quot;</p>
<p>The end result, is that none of these inputs:</p>
<pre><code>&lt;input class=&quot;productinfo&quot; name=&quot;partnumber&quot;&gt;
&lt;input class=&quot;productinfo&quot; name=&quot;description&quot;&gt;
&lt;input class=&quot;productinfo&quot; name=&quot;color&quot;&gt;
<p>...will validate unless either at least two of them are filled,
OR none of them are.
</code></pre></p>
<p>partnumber:	{skip_or_fill_minimum: [2,&quot;.productinfo&quot;]},
description: {skip_or_fill_minimum: [2,&quot;.productinfo&quot;]},
color:		{skip_or_fill_minimum: [2,&quot;.productinfo&quot;]}</p>
<p>options[0]: number of fields that must be filled in the group
options[1]: CSS selector that defines the group of conditionally required fields</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"skip_or_fill_minimum"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element, options </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> $fields = $( options[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ], element.form ),
		$fieldsFirst = $fields.eq( <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ),
		validator = $fieldsFirst.data( <span class="hljs-string">"valid_skip"</span> ) ? $fieldsFirst.data( <span class="hljs-string">"valid_skip"</span> ) : $.extend( {}, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ),
		numberFilled = $fields.filter( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> validator.elementValue( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		} ).length,
		isValid = numberFilled === <span class="hljs-number">0</span> || numberFilled &gt;= options[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];

</pre>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-69" id="section-69"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Validates US States and/or Territories by @jdforsythe
Can be case insensitive or require capitalization - default is case insensitive
Can include US Territories or not - default does not
Can include US Military postal abbreviations (AA, AE, AP) - default does not</p>
<p>Note: &quot;States&quot; always includes DC (District of Colombia)</p>
<p>Usage examples:</p>
<p>This is the default - case insensitive, no territories, no military zones
stateInput: {
caseSensitive: false,
includeTerritories: false,
includeMilitary: false
}</p>
<p>Only allow capital letters, no territories, no military zones
stateInput: {
caseSensitive: false
}</p>
<p>Case insensitive, include territories but not military zones
stateInput: {
includeTerritories: true
}</p>
<p>Only allow capital letters, include territories and military zones
stateInput: {
caseSensitive: true,
includeTerritories: true,
includeMilitary: true
}</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"stateUS"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value, element, options </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> isDefault = <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> options === <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span>,
		caseSensitive = ( isDefault || <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> options.caseSensitive === <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span> ) ? <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> : options.caseSensitive,
		includeTerritories = ( isDefault || <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> options.includeTerritories === <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span> ) ? <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> : options.includeTerritories,
		includeMilitary = ( isDefault || <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> options.includeMilitary === <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span> ) ? <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> : options.includeMilitary,
		regex;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !includeTerritories &amp;&amp; !includeMilitary ) {
		regex = <span class="hljs-string">"^(A[KLRZ]|C[AOT]|D[CE]|FL|GA|HI|I[ADLN]|K[SY]|LA|M[ADEINOST]|N[CDEHJMVY]|O[HKR]|PA|RI|S[CD]|T[NX]|UT|V[AT]|W[AIVY])$"</span>;
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( includeTerritories &amp;&amp; includeMilitary ) {
		regex = <span class="hljs-string">"^(A[AEKLPRSZ]|C[AOT]|D[CE]|FL|G[AU]|HI|I[ADLN]|K[SY]|LA|M[ADEINOPST]|N[CDEHJMVY]|O[HKR]|P[AR]|RI|S[CD]|T[NX]|UT|V[AIT]|W[AIVY])$"</span>;
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( includeTerritories ) {
		regex = <span class="hljs-string">"^(A[KLRSZ]|C[AOT]|D[CE]|FL|G[AU]|HI|I[ADLN]|K[SY]|LA|M[ADEINOPST]|N[CDEHJMVY]|O[HKR]|P[AR]|RI|S[CD]|T[NX]|UT|V[AIT]|W[AIVY])$"</span>;
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
		regex = <span class="hljs-string">"^(A[AEKLPRZ]|C[AOT]|D[CE]|FL|GA|HI|I[ADLN]|K[SY]|LA|M[ADEINOST]|N[CDEHJMVY]|O[HKR]|PA|RI|S[CD]|T[NX]|UT|V[AT]|W[AIVY])$"</span>;
	}

	regex = caseSensitive ? <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( regex ) : <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( regex, <span class="hljs-string">"i"</span> );
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || regex.test( value );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"Please specify a valid state"</span> );

</pre>
        </td>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-72" id="section-72"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Return true, if the value is a valid vehicle identification number (VIN).</p>
<p>Works with all kind of text inputs.</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
<div class="details">
<div class="dox_tag_title">Type</div>
<div class="dox_tag_detail">
<span class="dox_type">oolea</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">$.validator.addMethod( <span class="hljs-string">"vinUS"</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> v </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( v.length !== <span class="hljs-number">17</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> LL = [ <span class="hljs-string">"A"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"B"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"C"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"D"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"E"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"F"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"G"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"H"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"J"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"K"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"L"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"M"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"N"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"P"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"R"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"S"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"T"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"U"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"V"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"W"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"X"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"Y"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"Z"</span> ],
		VL = [ <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ],
		FL = [ <span class="hljs-number">8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">10</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">9</span>, <span class="hljs-number">8</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ],
		rs = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		i, n, d, f, cd, cdv;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i &lt; <span class="hljs-number">17</span>; i++ ) {
		f = FL[ i ];
		d = v.slice( i, i + <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( i === <span class="hljs-number">8</span> ) {
			cdv = d;
		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !<span class="hljs-built_in">isNaN</span>( d ) ) {
			d *= f;
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( n = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; n &lt; LL.length; n++ ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( d.toUpperCase() === LL[ n ] ) {
					d = VL[ n ];
					d *= f;
					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">isNaN</span>( cdv ) &amp;&amp; n === <span class="hljs-number">8</span> ) {
						cdv = LL[ n ];
					}
					<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
				}
			}
		}
		rs += d;
	}
	cd = rs % <span class="hljs-number">11</span>;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( cd === <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ) {
		cd = <span class="hljs-string">"X"</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( cd === cdv ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
}, <span class="hljs-string">"The specified vehicle identification number (VIN) is invalid."</span> );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.optional( element ) || <span class="hljs-regexp">/^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$/</span>.test( value );
}, <span class="hljs-string">"The specified US ZIP Code is invalid"</span> );

}, <span class="hljs-string">"Your ZIP-code must be in the range 902xx-xxxx to 905xx-xxxx"</span> );
